title: 2022-03-04 - Free HermeticRansom Ransomware Decryptor Released
plain_text:
# Free HermeticRansom Ransomware Decryptor Released

**[threatpost.com/free-hermeticransom-ransomware-decryptor-released/178762/](https://threatpost.com/free-hermeticransom-ransomware-decryptor-released/178762/)**

## Subscribe to our Threatpost Today newsletter

Join thousands of people who receive the latest breaking cybersecurity news every day.

The administrator of your personal data will be Threatpost, Inc., 500 Unicorn Park, Woburn,
MA 01801. Detailed information on the processing of personal data can be found in the
[privacy policy. In addition, you will find them in the message confirming the subscription to](https://threatpost.com/web-privacy-policy/)
the newsletter.

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
